text: Yeah, so I think it's really been a function of Trump starting to lead and get a more aggressive lead post the shooting announcement and the fact that he's pro bitcoin. And some folks that were short some optionality as well that got squeezed. There was all this back and forth, and we were like, can we just delete all of that? And in your river account, you can just click send as a link, enter the amount, creates a link. You send it to a friend, and they can claim the bitcoin however they want, whether they have a river account or not. And it deletes that interaction. Hopefully, we're going to do another report this year, so we'll see what it is.
